[[File:Figure C.jpg|vignette|Multiple actinic keratoses of the scalp]]

question.title: What is the typical appearance of a skin precancerous lesion like actinic keratoses?
question.description: What is the typical appearance of a skin precancerous lesion like actinic keratoses?

option_a.title: A small, painless, and firm lump on the skin
option_a.description: A small, painless, and firm lump on the skin

option_b.title: A rough, scaly, and red patch on the skin
option_b.description: A rough, scaly, and red patch on the skin

option_c.title: A flat, pink, and smooth patch on the skin
option_c.description: A flat, pink, and smooth patch on the skin

option_d.title: A large, itchy, and bleeding lesion on the skin
option_d.description: A large, itchy, and bleeding lesion on the skin
